Comment.Language: From the Paramoun of the Nativity to the Feast of the Circumcision:

Text.Language: Ni,eroubim ceouwst m~mof: niceravim ce]w~ou naf: euws e~bol eujw m~moc: je ,~ouab ,~ouab ,~ouab P[oic qen niananso ektai/out qen nanay~ba: n~yok ouc~yoinoufi pencwt/r je aumack akcw] m~mon nai nan.

The cherubim worship Him and the seraphim glorify Him, proclaiming and saying: â€œHoly, Holy, Holy, the Lord among the thousands, and honored among the myriads. You are the incense, O our Savior, for you were born and saved us.â€?

Comment.Language: From Paramoun of the Theophany until the 12th of Tobe:

Text.Language: Ni,eroubim ceouwst m~mof: niceravim ce]w~ou naf: euws e~bol eujw m~moc: je ,~ouab ,~ouab ,~ouab P[oic qen niananso ektai/out qen nanay~ba: n~yok ouc~yoinoufi pencwt/r je ak[iwmc akcw] m~mon nai nan.

The cherubim worship Him and the seraphim glorify Him, proclaiming and saying: â€œHoly, Holy, Holy, the Lord among the thousands, and honored among the myriads. You are the incense, O our Savior, for you were baptized and saved us.â€?

Comment.Language: On the Feast of the Cross:

Text.Language: Ni,eroubim ceouwst m~mof: niceravim ce]w~ou naf: euws e~bol eujw m~moc: je ,~ouab ,~ouab ,~ouab P[oic qen niananso ektai/out qen nanay~ba: n~yok ouc~yoinoufi pencwt/r je auask akcw] m~mon nai nan.

The cherubim worship Him and the seraphim glorify Him, proclaiming and saying: â€œHoly, Holy, Holy, the Lord among the thousands, and honored among the myriads. You are the incense, O our Savior, for you were crucified and saved us.â€?
